name: Fine Fragrance Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Self-care isnu2019t selfish. Itu2019s a love letter to yourself that you write every day, sealed with a spray of your perfume. Like a precious diamond, these four fine fragrances reflect every one of your facets, from flirty and feminine to bold and unapologetic..About the Fragrance:I AM HER is a rich, faceted gourmand that layers decadent notes of red velvet, pear, and raspberry. Hard to Get is a bright, luminous blend of energizing citron zest, sheer jasmine, and whipped vanilla. NDA is a sensual fragrance with bold notes of spiced rum, tobacco flower, and vanilla bean. You Remind Me is a blend of soft apricot skin, orange flower, and sensual musks..This Set Contains:- 4 x 0.1 oz/ 3 mL fragrances in I AM HER, Hard to Get, NDA, You Remind Me
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethyhexyl Salicyate Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try these perfumes, however I was severely disappointed like every other review under these they came haft full if even that! they are amazing scents but made me very fearful of ordering full-size. If youu2019re looking for good perfume testers I would highly recommend skipping these and trying from another brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this perfume line so I decided to purchase the sample set. When I received the item, the sample vials were have full. Clearly this was returned by someone else. I am very disappointed in Sephora for sending this to me. Will never purchase again. If I could give it zero stars, I would.

reviews.review_title: Unique scents, sadly came half empty
reviews.review_text: Packaging error for sure with these, the box smelled strong like it was leaking and as you can see theyu2019re basically half empty.  These scents are definitely unique. Iu2019m that girl would be my favourite. I didnu2019t like NDA at first but itu2019s slowly growing on my the more I smell it. You remind me is a nice clean smell. Hard to get is the scent Iu2019m having the most trouble loving, Iu2019ll have try it in the summer time and see if it grows on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My mom purchased this for me this holiday season and had it shipped to me. Like the other reviews say go in store to purchase. My bottles were half empty as well. Will be returning.

reviews.review_text: Just enough for me to figure out what scent I loved the best. They lasted on me all day!! Jackie really did her thing with these.

reviews.review_text: I got this for Christmas today. Before I even opened it I had a feeling the product was damaged because I got a huge whiff of one scent, and surprise surprise, one vial was completely empty.

Came almost empty. This is sad. Paid $33 for this? Nook!
I brought this as a gift. The bottles look half empty! I don't like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live in an area without a Sephora so most all of my fragrance purchases are blind buys.  I'm mostly successful with picking based on notes, but have learned to buy these discovery sets before trying a new brand.    Based on the notes, I thought Hard To Get would be my scent.  Sadly, it is more vanilla frosting in scent than anything lemon and something in it really makes me sneeze.  NDA, as an individual fragrance, hadn't even pinged on my radar despite my keeping an eye on Forvr Mood releases, but the second I sprayed it on I was in love.  It is delicious and sexy and I ordered the full size.  I Am Her will also very likely be a future purchase.  It's another scent I immediately think of as just delicious.  You Remind Me is too subtle for me to detect an identifiable scent and, unfortunately, it also has some element that makes me sneeze, though not as badly as Hard To Get.  Like all of these fragrances, it has hours long staying power and I can faintly detect the apricot after an hour.  So 2 out of 4 of these are absolute winners, 2 are losers, but the set is still a solid 5 stars, because it helped me discover that without having to buy more expensive travel or full-sized versions.  The packaging for the little sprayers is high quality and I absolutely love how it has a description of each scent below the slot for the sprayer.  This is a great gift to self if you're curious about these perfumes or gift for another if these scents sound good to them.

reviews.review_title: Love my girl Jackie Jackie Jackie!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrances are all really nice and feminine. You will purchase a full size bottle.

I just received my package, and the lid broke off. Not only that, but there's not enough perfume in a few of the bottles. I finally get to purchase the perfume, and I'm disappointed. But it smells REALLY good. Who is to blame? I paid $24 for this. I don't think it's worth it. Sis, where are you @jackieania???

reviews.review_title: Paid to Much for Half Empty Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge Jackie Aina fan so I was excited to get this set. I open the box and to my surprise all of the vials were half empty! The one that I did take out and smell was great but I will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Does what itu2019s supposed to do
reviews.review_text: Mixed feelings. I definitely was surprised by the size of the bottles. I understand itu2019sa discovery set and the purpose is to find which scents you like before committing to the big bottle but these still seemed pretty tiny. Otherwise I enjoyed all 4 scents. They all smell very nice and unique.  They werenu2019t very long lasting. Idk if thatu2019s because they were the samples. I would like to purchase all of them but I am concerned about the longevity. All in all, as a discovery set it does what itu2019s supposed to do which is introduce you to the scents before making a big commitment

reviews.review_title: Why is one bottle half empty.
reviews.review_text: Packages is very nice however two of the bottles are half empty. I think I am going to return it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why this is $24, its just a tiny tester vial. The photo looks big, but in person its the size of those tester vials that they give out for free at department stores. This is just one of those shameless rip offs. what a disappointment. These perfumes literally smell like bath and body works. This is a No Go for me. I'm have to be completely honest, they really need to put some more work into this fragrance line. Shamelessly charging $24 for microscopically testers and mostly packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

The Pride taken in this product is very apparent not just from the beautifully  crafted scents but the packaging is carefully curated and the tester bottles donu2019t feel cheap and work perfectly. Also the size of each tester gives you SEVERAL wears! Long story short this discovery kit is absolutely that girlud83dudc95

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I caught this back in stock in store andud83dude01. it has a sweet scent for everyone in there.  I will say if you hate vanilla and sweet scents overall, this may not be for you.  NDA and hard to get were my faves. I will purchase the full size once I'm finished with these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love every single scent. these lean towards gourmand so if you are not fond of that these may not be for you, each one is delicious, and unique but familiar at the same time. I will be ordering in full size when i am done with the trials

reviews.review_title: Whatu2019s w/ the bad reviews? Glad I tried for myself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t planning to write a review, but seeing so many 1 and 2-star reviews, possibly from Jackie haters, I decided to share my honest opinion. I bought the discovery set myself! It gave me the chance to experience each scent in the comfort of my home. I enjoyed all the scents, even the lemony one, which I usually hate. As for longevity, I can't say for sure since I tend to spray myself DOWN and would need a full-sized bottle to determine that. I will definitely purchase a full-sized bottle or two to add to my collection. Regarding the comments about the quality being cheap, I think it's important to remember that this is a new product from a fairly new brand. Considering it is an accessible luxury product, the price matches the quality well in a positive way. Expect what you pay for. If you want higher quality, be prepared to pay for it. Overall, I think itu2019s giving what itu2019s supposed to give! Great fragrance samples in a nice packageu2026

reviews.review_title: Great everyday and budget friendly perfumes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Each scent is different and I have my favourites and those I will purchase the full size of. These do not last all day and that's ok since these work great for being in the office and work well around others without being overpowering, this is not a negative for me. Most of these are great neutrals that work for for being around people in enclosed spaces and are great for everyday. I love the price point as it make it accessible and budget friendly. I'm thankful there was foresight in offering a discovery kit for those of us who do no like to blind buy because those of us who love perfumes can tell if we make like it by the notes, the blend is always different

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of these scents especially, Hard to get smells like a sexy vanilla ughhhh Iu2019m in love. You Remind me is a cute and cozy scent. the other smell good also! Canu2019t wait to purchase the big bottles when they restock!!!

reviews.review_title: Nice scents, poor quality packaging and bottles.

reviews.review_text: The packaging for the discovery set could be much better. They could tape the box or fragrances in place. When I received my package, every single vial was out of place and in the bigger shipping box. The mini bottles could also be better. It feels as if the cap isnu2019t on tight enough for any of them, and they donu2019t seem adequately filled. Overall, though, I do love the scents and will make a purchase for a full size bottle soon.

Although light itu2019s warm and doesnu2019t disappear. I would advise purchasing the sample set first to see how it wears o. Your body.

reviews.review_title: The best way to discover the one(s) for you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received all four bottles in the nice packaging. Iu2019d say they were about 90-95% filled to the top and it really does help you assess if youu2019d want to buy the full size or travel sizes. Not the easiest blind buys so this is definitely worth getting if youu2019re interested.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this set and was impressed. I am not a perfume person, but I wanted to support the brand owner. All of my bottles were full and all of the scents were nice. I Am Her reminded me of my grandmother- not in a bad way, just brought some good memories. My least favorite was NDA solely because I am more of alight scent person if Iu2019m going to wear perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love jackie but this was not it! i know she's just starting out with fragrances and all but if that were the case, she should've priced these individual bottles a little cheaper. there's no depth / no longevity to any of these scents... and it's so unfortunate because these individual bottles are STUNNING.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like many others, I received a very small amount of perfume within the bottles. Unfortunately will be returning this, I was expecting them to be filled up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm happy I picked this up in order to decide what fragrance will be best for me in a full size. I love a mini to carry on the go. Overall nice set and great scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Quick synopsis and individual scent reviews to follow: I am genuinely confused after receiving and trying my sample set- the reviews under individual fragrances are predominantly positive, but after trying the sample set, I have to agree with many of the reviewers here and am largely underwhelmed. A majority of these are very dense, heavy fragrances on my skin. I also agree, these are not safe u201cblind buysu201du2026 even if the notes seem appealing (which they do!) they donu2019t quite translate how you might think. That said, I am just one person and perfume is incredibly suggestive, so who knows, maybe these will work for you!  I did genuinely enjoy NDA- I donu2019t really get any of the notes listed, it reads like a sweet, warm cardamom, almond, and vanilla scent to my nose, which I love! That one wore much lighter than the others. Sadly, the other 3 scents in the collection are a huge miss for me- they smell rough around the edges and quite one note/linear. I Am Her gave me dark chocolate and a heavy, almost woody patchouli (not a listed note but I assume a facet of the u201coudu201d), I didnu2019t get any raspberry, pear, or red velvet. Hard to Get is a super sweet vanilla frosting scent with lemon (leaning toward lemon scented cleaning product). You Remind Me is fine- a rather run-of-the-mill soapy floral with some sweetness from the apricot but wears quite strong on the skin. Ultimately, Iu2019m disappointed butu2026 it is what it is! I hope the brand continues to innovate and expand this realm of their collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love supporting creators but this collection was quite a miss for me. The majority of my collection are niche fragrances so perhaps I wasn't the appropriate audience for this launch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it but havenu2019t tried it yet this is more so on the package. I received a bottle that was more than half empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells are pretty good! NDA was delivered half-full, which is a huge disappointment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smell great and the smells had longevity. NDA was my fav
These scents just werenu2019t for me and did not pair well on my skin. Scents gave me a headacheu2014 so much so that I had to immediately wash them off my skin. These are not safe blind buys AT ALL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: hard to get is my favorite. the citrus and vanilla are not overpowering because sometimes a lot of vanilla scents can be over whelming it lasted 3.5, almost 4 hours on my. you remind me is next, and it's a nice fresh light scent that feels like an everyday work smell especially if you work in an office space or someplace where strong scents will bother others around you, this lasted 3 hours. NDA starts with a strong tobacco smell, but the dry down becomes smooth and sweet. I did not think I would like this smell, but the dry down is beautiful.  I am her was my least favorite it almost had like a penny smell to it I. my opinion is not so much raspberry. I ended up purchasing hard to get and you remind me in the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I didn't even get all 4 tunes and am missing NDA so I really want my money back because I feel cheated. That's all I have to say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these so bad! They all smell so good but they literally donu2019t last. Youu2019d have to keep reapplying to smell! These would have been better as body mists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly cheap. This smells like a super cheap perfume set for young girls that you can find at Claireu2019s or a TJ Maxx. Jackie is known for having an insane perfume collection so this is super disappointing. Not worth the price especially the full bottles.  Super late

reviews.review_title: A+ kit, bought 2, will wait for others 2 restock
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shocked at the negative reviews, honestly loved all apart from NDA and thatu2019s because itu2019s nut my type of fragrance, but would definitely but to layer and be daring. I am not a fragrance newbie and these are stunning!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I got the set before I committed to a full size bottle. Hard To Get smells so good. If you are a vanilla girly, you will love this scent. NDA is my next fave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just not goodu2026smells very cheap. I donu2019t want to compare to bath and body works because they donu2019t smell as good. I really wanted to support Jackie on this one but I think Iu2019ll be returning this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because I love Jackie and she did not disappoint! Iu2019m very picky about fragrances because Iu2019m prone to migraines and I had no issues with this set. Theyu2019re strong without being overbearing and I find that they have good lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Am Her and You Remind Me are beautiful scents! NDA and Hard to Get are not terrible, just not as appealing. I REALLY want the full size but Iu2019m concerned about the longevity. An hour or so in I could no longer smell anything.
Hard to get is my fav! Overall, they all smell pretty, but the scent wears off very quickly, less than an hour for me. I would not purchase the full size for that reason alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh i love! For the price itu2019s def worth it. I sprayed nda on around 11am did all my mom errands and was still smelling it after sweating around 8pm. I like more of light weight and airy scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrances. Still canu2019t find my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh I feel like these were so overhyped man. Hard to get was my favorite due to it being a lemon gourmand. NDA has a smoky vanilla vibe, You remind me smells like musky alcohol and then I am her was NOT her for me. I am her was the strongest yet these all lack longevity, I feel like they each last about 3 hours on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so disappointed in this set. Based on the hype Iu2019ve been seeing online, I was expecting so much more. To my nose, these donu2019t smell luxurious or refined. They have the strength and longevity of a body spray. You Remind Me is the best smelling in my opinion, but not long lasting enough to be worth it in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I will start by saying that I am very picky when it comes to fragrances. I don't have many, and I am not too fond of trying out new scents. However, ever since Jackie recommended my favorite everyday fragrance - Princess by Killian, I trust her sense of smell. I ordered this set expecting to like only one or two fragrances, but to my surprise, I LOVE all of them! Although I thought I Am Her would be my favorite, I ended up liking the other three more. I will definitely order a large size of You Remind Me and Hard to Get. Great job, Jackie!
